Class CapCompany

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Cards
      • game.LandCards

  • public class CapCompany
extends LandCards
    An abstract class for holding the information for cap companies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CapCompany

        public CapCompany(java.lang.String CardName,
          int landPrice,
          int rent,
          int buildingPrice,
          int mortgagedPrice)
        Construct a card with necessary informations for cab company.
        Parameters:
        CardName - Name of the cab company.
        landPrice - Cost for the player to buy.
        rent - Rent to be paid to this cap company's owner.
        buildingPrice - Cost for the owner to put a cab stand.
        mortgagedPrice - Amount of money losed when mortgaged or gained when unmortgaged.

    • Method Detail

      • getTaxiRideChoices

        public static java.lang.String[] getTaxiRideChoices()
        Returns:
        returns an String array that holds the choices to offer the player, when player lands on a cap company.
